objects.name: Tank
objects.description: A game unit with attributes like HP, Speed, Damage, Reload Time, Fire Rate, Projectile Speed, and Range.
objects.source_note: Weighted Index calculation table for Assault Tank.

systems.name: Weighted Index System
systems.description: A system to calculate the Weighted Index of a Tank based on its attributes and their Design Weights.
systems.mechanics: Uses Multipliers and Design Weights to compute the Weighted Index.
systems.objectives: To balance and compare the effectiveness of different Tanks in gameplay.
interactions: Reload Time and Fire Rate influence DPS.
Projectile Speed and Range have minimal impact.
systems.source_note: Explanation of Weighted Index formula and its application.

logic_rules.description: The Weighted Index is calculated by summing the product of each attribute's Multiplier and Design Weight.
logic_rules.effect: Determines the overall impact of a Tank's attributes on gameplay.
logic_rules.source_note: Formula and example provided in the context.

logic_rules.summary: Attribute Importance Based on Design Weights
logic_rules.description: Attributes with higher Design Weights have a greater impact on gameplay.
logic_rules.trigger: During game balancing or design adjustments.
logic_rules.effect: Guides designers in prioritizing attributes for balance.

requirements.title: Balance Tank Attributes
requirements.description: Ensure no single attribute dominates a Tank's effectiveness by using Weighted Index calculations.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Tanks should have balanced Weighted Index values across different classes.
requirements.source_note: Context emphasizes the importance of balancing attributes.

requirements.title: Implement Weighted Index Calculation
requirements.description: Develop a system to calculate and display the Weighted Index for Tanks.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: System accurately calculates Weighted Index based on Multipliers and Design Weights.
requirements.source_note: Requirement inferred from the need to use Weighted Index for balancing.
